ai-patthana9.2:0.2_0: It is manifested as a responsible dawn, unintelligent to the Dhamma.
ai-patthana9.2:1.1_0: You don’t give a teaching with no pleasant feeling.
ai-patthana9.2:1.1_1: You shouldn’t give a teaching with no happiness for the sake of pleasant feeling.
ai-patthana9.2:1.1_2: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana9.2:3.1_0: You shouldn’t give a teaching with painful feeling conditioned by painful feeling.
ai-patthana9.2:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana9.2:5.1_0: You don’t give rise to the pleasant feeling with painful feelings.
ai-patthana9.2:5.1_1: This is the section in brief.
